import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id) return <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price}.00 Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price}.00 Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'Available' : 'Not Available (Sorry, we are working on it!)'} } export default ProductScreen
